pages.text: Everybody knows that all the cool kids have socks. As such, it is of course possible to obtain a pair for oneself. Easily obtained using some $(item)Wool$() adorned with $(l:things:items/gleaming_materials)Gleaming Powder$(), they provide an instant $(thing)speed boost$(). Should there be a need for even greater swiftness, the $(item)Socks$() may be upgraded with a $(thing)String Potion of Swiftness$() and some $(l:things:items/gleaming_materials)Gleaming Powder$().

Similarly, a $(item)Rabbit Foot Charm$() may be integrated, consuming one $(item)Gleaming Compound$(). This will bestow upon the wearer $(thing)Jump Boost II$() as well as $(thing)step-assist$(). Said $(item)Jump Boost$() may also be toggled by $(thing)sneaking for one second while sprinting$().
